location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 3122/1921 Pt 2 'Persia: Consulates: M. O. for Consulate at Bunder Abbas'

mods.abstract: Correspondence, draft papers, and minutes relating to the appointment of a Medical Officer at HM Consulate Bandar Abbas. The correspondence is between the Government of India (Foreign and Political Department), Foreign Office, and India Office. Further correspondence comes from the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf and HM Consulate, Bandar Abbas.Other matters covered briefly by the papers include the withdrawal of Quarantine Medical Officers from the Persian Gulf and the suggestion to close the Consular Agency at Lingah.
